title: The Day of Becoming You
overview: Jiang Yi, the leader of the popular boy band, suffers because his parents divorced when he was a child, and remarried. He does not know how to express his thoughts well, does not hide his desire to be loved and is misunderstood by the public. Yu Sheng Sheng, a reporter of entertainment programs, is trying to restore the truth behind the gossip about celebrities, wondering how valuable popularity in the new media industry. The two main characters were born on the same day and thanks to an unknown magical power they change bodies.Â
